confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
name: Name
playerIdHelper: Leave blank to auto-generate an ID or supply a unique ID using letters, numbers, underscores, or hyphens.
competitionIdHelper: Leave blank to auto-generate the ID. Use letters, numbers, underscores, or hyphens when providing one.
venueIdHelper: Leave blank to auto-generate the ID or provide your own using letters, numbers, underscores, or hyphens.
refereeIdHelper: Leave blank to auto-generate the ID or provide your own using letters, numbers, underscores, or hyphens.
localizedNamesDescription: Override the display name per language (optional). Leave blank to fall back to the default name.

roleDescriptions.admin: Full access to all system features and user management
roleDescriptions.analyst: Can create and edit match events and analytics

cannotDeactivateSelf: You cannot deactivate your own account
confirmDeactivate: Are you sure you want to deactivate this user?
confirmActivate: Are you sure you want to activate this user?

deleteGuards.refereeMatches: Delete blocked: this referee is linked to {{count}} match(es). Remove the referee assignment from those matches before trying again.
deleteGuards.competitionMatches: Delete blocked: this competition is linked to {{count}} match(es). Remove or reassign those matches before deleting.
deleteGuards.playerAssignments: Delete blocked: this player is linked to {{count}} team assignment(s). Remove the player from those teams before deleting.
deleteGuards.teamMatches: Delete blocked: this team is linked to {{count}} match(es). Remove or reassign those matches before deleting.
deleteGuards.venueMatches: Delete blocked: this venue is linked to {{count}} match(es). Update or remove those matches before deleting.

duplicateWarning.title: Potential Duplicates Found
duplicateWarning.message: Found {{count}} similar entries that might be duplicates:

validation.exactDuplicateExists: An identical record already exists in the database. Cannot create duplicate.
validation.fixErrors: Please fix all validation errors before submitting
validation.noChangesDetected: No changes detected. The data is identical to the original record.

validationErrors.playerNameMin: Player name must be at least 2 characters
validationErrors.playerNameMax: Player name must not exceed 100 characters
validationErrors.playerIdMax: Player ID must not exceed 40 characters
validationErrors.playerIdFormat: Player ID must use letters, numbers, underscores, or hyphens
validationErrors.birthDateFormat: Birth date must be in YYYY-MM-DD format
validationErrors.nationalityMin: Nationality must be at least 2 characters
validationErrors.heightMin: Height must be at least 100 cm
validationErrors.heightInvalid: Height must be a valid number
validationErrors.weightMin: Weight must be at least 30 kg
validationErrors.weightInvalid: Weight must be a valid number
validationErrors.teamNameMin: Team name must be at least 2 characters
validationErrors.teamNameMax: Team name must not exceed 100 characters
validationErrors.shortNameMin: Short name must be at least 2 characters
validationErrors.shortNameMax: Short name must not exceed 10 characters
validationErrors.shortNameMax20: Short name must not exceed 20 characters
validationErrors.genderInvalid: Gender must be either male or female
validationErrors.managerNameMin: Manager name must be at least 2 characters
validationErrors.managerNameMax: Manager name must not exceed 100 characters
validationErrors.managerNationalityMin: Manager nationality must be at least 2 characters
validationErrors.managerNationalityMax: Manager nationality must not exceed 100 characters
validationErrors.yearsExpMin: Years of experience must be at least 0
validationErrors.yearsExpMax70: Years of experience must not exceed 70
validationErrors.yearsExpMax50: Years of experience must not exceed 50
validationErrors.yearsExpInvalid: Years of experience must be a valid number
validationErrors.startDateFormat: Start date must be in YYYY-MM-DD format
validationErrors.refereeNameMin: Referee name must be at least 2 characters
validationErrors.refereeNameMax: Referee name must not exceed 100 characters
validationErrors.refereeIdMax: Referee ID must not exceed 40 characters
validationErrors.refereeIdFormat: Referee ID must use letters, numbers, underscores, or hyphens
validationErrors.venueNameMin: Venue name must be at least 2 characters
validationErrors.venueNameMax: Venue name must not exceed 100 characters
validationErrors.venueIdMax: Venue ID must not exceed 40 characters
validationErrors.venueIdFormat: Venue ID must use letters, numbers, underscores, or hyphens
validationErrors.cityMin: City must be at least 2 characters
validationErrors.countryMin: Country must be at least 2 characters
validationErrors.capacityInvalid: Capacity must be a valid number
validationErrors.surfaceInvalid: Surface must be Natural Grass, Artificial Turf, or Hybrid
validationErrors.competitionNameMin: Competition name must be at least 2 characters
validationErrors.competitionNameMax: Competition name must not exceed 100 characters
validationErrors.competitionIdMax: Competition ID must not exceed 40 characters
validationErrors.competitionIdFormat: Competition ID must use letters, numbers, underscores, or hyphens
validationErrors.localizedNameMax: Localized name must not exceed 100 characters

changeConfirmation.title: Significant Changes Detected
changeConfirmation.message: The modifications you made changed {{percentage}}% of the data. This will considerably replace the original information.
changeConfirmation.reviewMessage: You modified {{count}} field(s) with {{percentage}}% overall change. Please review the changes below:

similarRecords.title: Similar Records Found
similarRecords.description: Found {{count}} similar record(s) in the database. Review them before proceeding.
similarRecords.openInNewWindow: Open in separate window for evaluation

ingestion.title: Ingestion Manager
ingestion.subtitle: Upload CSV/JSON files, copy prompts, and monitor every batch in one place.
ingestion.adminOnlyDesc: Only workspace administrators can run imports from this screen.
ingestion.bulkDesc: Send multi-model payloads in a single file and we'll auto-route them to each dataset.
ingestion.bulkPrompt: Transform the provided dataset into CSV using the exact headers from our ingestion template.
ingestion.aiPromptDescription: Share this prompt with your AI assistant so generated data matches our schema.
ingestion.bulkTemplateNote: Paste the generated data into the template before uploading it here.
ingestion.countriesDesc: Country names must exactly match one of our supported values.
ingestion.playerPositionsDesc: Accepted values: Goalkeeper, Defender, Midfielder, Forward.
ingestion.surfacesDesc: Use Natural Grass, Artificial Turf, or Hybrid.
ingestion.duplicatesDesc: We automatically flag potential duplicates during ingestion.
ingestion.matchesDesc: Large match files may take a few minutes; monitor progress in the batches table.
ingestion.templatePrompt: Download a template or copy the AI prompt before uploading.
ingestion.selectFile: Select a CSV or JSON file
ingestion.redirectingToBatch: Redirecting you to the batch for live monitoring...
ingestion.batchNotFound: Import not found or you don't have permission to view it
ingestion.editInstructions: Feel free to modify the fields below before accepting this record
ingestion.deleteBatchConfirm: Delete the "{{name}}" batch? This removes its ingestion history but leaves the source records untouched.
ingestion.deleteBatchError: We couldn't delete the batch. Please try again.
ingestion.deleteBatchDisabledTooltip: Batches that are processing or still have open conflicts cannot be deleted yet.
ingestion.rejectReasonPlaceholder: Explain why you're rejecting this record (e.g., 'Duplicate entry', 'Incorrect data')...
ingestion.conflictResolvedMessage: Already resolved. Refresh the batch to see the latest status.

conflict.editInstructions: Update only the values that need to change. JSON is supported for nested objects.
conflict.noDifferences: No field-level differences were captured for this conflict.
conflict.notesPlaceholder: Add context for future auditors (ex: accepted roster tweak from scouting feed).
conflict.rejectHelper: Choose a reason or provide detailed notes. Notes are required when selecting Other.
conflict.rejectNotesHelper: Provide at least 15 characters when selecting Other.
conflict.loadError: Unable to load conflict information. Please try again.
conflict.decisionDisabled: Close the dialog and refresh the table to continue.
